trans-unit.source: An element that allows you to host a Windows Forms control on a WPF page.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素，它允许在 WPF 页上托管 Windows 窗体控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control within your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element or page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>元素放置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件中你[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素或页。

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.
trans-unit.target: 到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制或窗体中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>控件。

trans-unit.source: WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.
The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.

To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]中控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，你必须分配[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制转移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A> property to assign custom mappings between a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A>要分配之间的自定义映射属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>元素并且其托管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Object Element Usage

The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element to host a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>元素来承载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a Windows Forms Control in WPF by Using XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 Windows 窗体控件中使用 xaml 的 WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 表示调用堆栈中所有高级调用方完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 父级中应使用此元素排列自身及其子元素的最终区域。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, positions child elements and determines a size for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />-derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，定位子元素并确定由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 派生的类的大小。

trans-unit.source: The actual size used.
Gets or sets the hosted control's background as an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 以环境属性的形式获取或设置托管控件的背景。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> set to the background color.
This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> field.

By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会对此属性进行映射，以更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>托管控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background%2A> property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息映射<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background%2A>属性，请参阅[Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*Brush*
See <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> for XAML Attribute syntax.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background" /> dependency property.
The parent window's handle (HWND).

Overrides the base class implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> to build the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> 的基类实现以生成承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件。

trans-unit.source: The window handle for this object.
Gets or sets the child control hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> 元素承载的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
Only one child control can be hosted, but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> can have any number of children.
trans-unit.target: 可以承载只有一个子控件，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>可以有任意数目的子级。

trans-unit.source: The child control cannot be a top-level form.
trans-unit.target: 子控件不能为顶级窗体。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property is set to `false`.
XAML Text Usage
`<` *object* `>`
`<` *hostedControl* `.../>`
`</` *object* `>`
XAML Values
*object*
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element (or a possible subclass).
*hostedControl*
An element that specifies the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.

Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 指定在标记中的自定义控件通常需要 xmlns 映射，请参见[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> property to add the hosted control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>要添加到托管的控件属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting an ActiveX Control in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 ActiveX 控件在 WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a top-level form as the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将顶级窗体指定为要承载的控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 在设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> 属性时发生。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
A window handle.
This parameter is not used.
Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> to delete the window containing this object.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> 以删除包含此对象的窗口。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Dispose%2A> method disposes the base <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> control.
Enables a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> 在从 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中以无模式方式打开时能正确运行。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> method to forward all keyboard messages when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A>方法转发所有键盘消息时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType>以无模式方式打开。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A>方法安装消息筛选器所需的无模式的窗体才能正常工作时通过打开[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: You need to call this method only once for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你需要为特定调用此方法仅一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>实例。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 表示调用堆栈中所有高级调用方完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: The font family used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 托管控件中使用的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置会影响其模板使用的属性作为参数这些控件。

trans-unit.source: It has no effect on other controls.
trans-unit.target: 它具有不会影响其他控件。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> field.
By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会对此属性进行映射，以更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所承载控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*fontFamily*
See <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> for XAML Attribute syntax.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamily" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the hosted control's font size.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件的字号。

trans-unit.source: The font size used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 托管控件中使用的字号。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty> field.
By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会对此属性进行映射，以更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所承载控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*double*
String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0, but smaller than <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>值等于或大于 0.0，但小于<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of 1 is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值为 1 是可接受的。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSize" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the hosted control's font style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件的字形。

trans-unit.source: The font style used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 托管控件中使用的字形。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontStyleProperty> field.
By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会对此属性进行映射，以更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所承载控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*fontStyle*
See <xref:System.Windows.FontStyle> for XAML Attribute syntax.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontStyle" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the hosted control's font weight.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: The font weight used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 托管控件中使用的字体粗细。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontWeightProperty> field.
By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会对此属性进行映射，以更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所承载控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*fontWeight*
See <xref:System.Windows.FontWeight> for XAML Attribute syntax.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontWeight" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the hosted control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> used to set the foreground color for the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于设置所承载控件的前景色的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty> field.
By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会对此属性进行映射，以更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>所承载控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground%2A> property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息映射<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground%2A>属性，请参阅[Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*Brush*
See <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> for XAML Attribute syntax.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>,
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>,
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground" /> dependency property.
Occurs when a layout error, such as a skew or rotation that <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> does not support, is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 在遇到布局错误（如进行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> 不支持的扭曲或旋转）时发生。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
The available size for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object.

Overrides the base class implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> to measure the size of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> 的基类实现以度量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> 对象的大小并将正确的大小返回给布局引擎。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object.
Size constraints in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout are hard constraints.
trans-unit.target: 中的大小约束[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]布局为硬性约束。

trans-unit.source: If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region.
trans-unit.target: 如果超过约束，主机必须在托管的区域内剪切内容。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现强制实施此行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
Arguments that identify the property that changed as well as providing that property's old and new values.
trans-unit.target: 标识已更改的属性以及提供此属性的原值和新值的参数。

trans-unit.source: Forces the translation of a mapped property.

Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.OnPropertyChanged%2A> method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element has not changed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.OnPropertyChanged%2A>上级元素的属性已更改，但的本地值时，可能需要方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>元素仍是如此。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the desired padding within the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 指定承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件内所需空白的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> structure representing the padding pf the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> 结构，它表示承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件的空白。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*Thickness*
See <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> for XAML Attribute syntax.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding" /> dependency property.

Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 获取属性映射，该属性映射决定了设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> 元素的属性会对承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件产生何种影响。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> that maps <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> properties to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" />，它将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> 属性映射到承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技术具有两个相似但不同属性模型。

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *属性映射*支持两种体系结构之间进行互操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何添加的映射<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>控件。

trans-unit.source: The new scale factor.
Scales the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control, and tracks the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 缩放承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件并跟踪缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />，表示应用于承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls do not support scaling in the same way as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] 控件不支持在相同的方式缩放[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, scaling a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，缩放[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件从因子为 1 到 0.5 的因素并返回到因子为 1，一般情况下，恢复该控件的原始大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WindowsFormsHost 元素的布局注意事项](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md)。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ScaleChild%2A> method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ScaleChild%2A>方法以提供有关将托管的自定义缩放行为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置托管控件的选项卡索引。

trans-unit.source: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.
trans-unit.target: 用于选项卡导航和焦点的选项卡索引。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> field.
Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于更改窗体上控件之间的选项卡导航的顺序。

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: 具有较低的选项卡索引的控件将获取之前具有更高版本的索引的控件的焦点。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex" /> dependency property.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> that specifies the focus behavior.
Forwards focus from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点从 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 转到承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control was activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件已激活，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element receives a TAB command from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> method, the first eligible control in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>元素接收中的选项卡命令<xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>方法，第一个符合要求的控件中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: The first control is specified by the `request` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控件指定通过`request`参数。

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next>, the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 当`request`是<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next>，行为是类似于按下 TAB 键。

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous>, the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: 当`request`是<xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous>，行为是类似于按下 SHIFT + TAB。

trans-unit.source: Window handle of the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: 所承载窗口的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Message to act upon.
Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: 可能与处理消息有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用于存储小段信息，如标志。

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: 可能与处理消息有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to reference an object.
Whether events resulting should be marked handled.
trans-unit.target: 是否应将所得事件标记为已处理。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，访问承载的子窗口的窗口进程。

trans-unit.source: The window handle of the child window.
